thread.section_title: CarShop Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.carshop.co.uk
thread.title: Barry Whitehead

author: Barry Whitehead
title: Barry Whitehead
text:
On a whim decided to pop into the Swindon Car Shop, just to have a look around.
Was met by Jody, very friendly and chatty, willing to listen and offer advice (even personal thoughts which is a nice touch).
We decided to take an offer on a car, which was a very good deal, low mileage and great condition.
Had to get the car on finance, so had to speak to a finance manager (Marc (no hair) I mean Adar), extremely helpful, interested in listen to us, both on a personal level and professional level.
Even got to meet the manager himself, also very nice.
Didn't feel pressured into anything, was given advice which was relevant and honest opinions, very surprised, but in a good way.
No hesitation to recommend them, only spoke to 3 people in total but all seemed like they not only enjoy their work, but also were able to converse with customers.
Will more than likely be going back to them for our next car.
